title: Mean Value Theorem
text: The Mean Value Theorem states that if a function f is continuous on the closed interval [a,b] and differentiable on the open interval (a,b), then there exists a point c in the interval (a,b) such that f'(c) is equal to the function's average rate of change over [a,b].

title: Secant Line
text: Draw the secant line between the $$2$$ end points then estimate the number of tangent lines parallel to the secant line
